description: Savour the sunset over Paris from the hotel, and explore its industrial chic enclave. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Suite Life: Sky-high pleasures at Too Hotel Paris - MGallery
title_page: Suite Life: Sky-high pleasures at Too Hotel Paris – MGallery | The Straits Times
maintext:
PARIS – As soon as the first rays of light filter through the louvred blinds, I reach for the bedside controls.
The blinds roll up like curtains preluding a concert and there it is – the pointed triangle of the Eiffel Tower in the distance, in a sea of buildings stretching to the horizon.
